clusterList.phrase: the pursuit of the class struggle by other means
that the rage and wrath of the masses must be inflamed against them they must be destroyed as a class because they are accursed

class hatred should be cultivated by an organic revulsion as far as the enemy is concerned enemies must be seen as inferior i believe quite profoundly that the enemy is our inferior and is a degenerate not only on the physical plane but also in the moral sense
respect through fear will always end in revolt unless it is cleverly disguised as religion
defend what is good in society
